Cause Fear:5
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], May Use Underwater [uwok])
A connection is created between living soldiers and the dead harrowed in the Netherworld. The targets are overwhelmed by fear and despair. Friendly troops are not exempt from the effect, should they stand in the way.
